{"id":1069086546,"question_id":724,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"11 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1696655078,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"19 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1069086546/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"31.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {\n        long long int sum=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++){\n            sum+=nums[i];\n        }\n        long long int sum1=0;\n        bool check=false;\n        long long int pos=-1;\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++){\n            if((sum-sum1-nums[i])==sum1){\n                pos=i;\n                check=true;\n                break;\n            }\n            sum1+=nums[i];\n        }\n        if(check){\n            return pos;\n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
